dialogueSegments.text: Hello sir! Welcome to the Seventino Midnight Cafe, my name is Chef! What brings you here?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: I’ll tell you what brings old Yertle here, Chef, a need to try every food!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Yertle

dialogueSegments.text: I’ve been around, little one. Now, my journey has brought me to your fine eatery.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Yertle

dialogueSegments.text: Well, I’m glad it has! That being the case, what can I get for you?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: My age has made tasting things quite difficult… how about something with a punch, like a Hot Claw?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Yertle

dialogueSegments.text: One Hot Claw, coming right up! That’ll pack a punch!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

bestEnding.text: Ouch! One hot claw, ready to serve! Be careful, it burns!
bestEnding.speaker: Chef

bestEnding.text: Oh! Careful young one, we wouldn’t want an injured chef! I can take that off your hands.
bestEnding.speaker: Yertle

bestEnding.text: Thanks Yertle! Well, what do you think? Spicy enough for you?
bestEnding.speaker: Chef

bestEnding.text: My tongue hasn’t been this hot since my trip to the Firelands!
bestEnding.speaker: Yertle

bestEnding.text: Say, you didn’t take any spices from there, did you?
bestEnding.speaker: Yertle

bestEnding.text: I definitely took inspiration from the brewers out there, but this is a creation of my own!
bestEnding.speaker: Chef

bestEnding.text: Ha! How amazing. Take pride in your work Chef, I’ll be telling my friends to come from all around.
bestEnding.speaker: Yertle

bestEnding.text: You’d do that for me? Thank you Yertle!
bestEnding.speaker: Chef

bestEnding.text: You let me know if you need anything, and I’ll be happy to provide it!
bestEnding.speaker: Chef

goodEnding.text: One Hot Claw, hot and ready! Be careful please!
goodEnding.speaker: Chef

goodEnding.text: No need to worry lad, I’ve had my fair share of coffee…
goodEnding.speaker: Yertle

goodEnding.text: Yeah? Well I bet none are as hot as mine!
goodEnding.speaker: Chef

goodEnding.text: Youch! You were right Chef! My tongue hasn’t felt this on fire since my trip to the Firelands!
goodEnding.speaker: Yertle

goodEnding.text: Just as I told you! Is there anything else I can get you? Perhaps some water?
goodEnding.speaker: Chef

goodEnding.text: That’ll do! Thank you Chef! I’ll be here.
goodEnding.speaker: Yertle
